ygData.subject: Re: Dagger of Marnek n Throwing...
ygData.msgSnippet: huh? how come cannot increase? jialatz lah... so unfair...  anyway... im not talking bout throwing that dagger away lah... just wanna improve my throwing if
ygData.messageBody:
huh? how come cannot increase? jialatz lah... so unfair... anyway... im not talking bout throwing that dagger away lah... just wanna improve my throwing if possible... max out all useful skills whenever i can... thast all...

Nic
----- Original Message -----
From: Leshrec
To: sg-everquest@onelist.com
Sent: Thursday, July 08, 1999 3:57 PM
Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Dagger of Marnek n Throwing...


Yeah but I think caster cannot increase throwing skill. Anyways, dagger good for increase in mana so why throw it? )

From: Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy <sccheng@...>

tot all chars got the skill throwing rite? so y cannot hit ler?

From: Leshrec
To: sg-everquest@onelist.com

Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Dagger of Marnek n Throwing...


No char will not throw in auto attack. Any if you can hit with throwing weapon, i think you can become monk liao )
-----Original Message-----
From: Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy <sccheng@...>
To: SG-Everquest Mailing List <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, July 09, 1999 1:38 PM
Subject: [sg-everquest] Dagger of Marnek n Throwing...


last info i heard is that we can equip this dagger into the throwing slot... so when i auto attack will the char be stupid enough to throw?

also... is shuriken useful? any suggestions as if i should pick up throwing? will be a useful tool if a wizard attempts to root me... n i can throw fast enough to disrupt him/her.. saw this in some disussion board... any comments?

Nic
